00000000011100000001110000000111

const int pieces[][] = { 
	{ 0b001111001, 0b111010010, 0b100111100, 0b010010111, }, // T
	{ 0b010111010, 0b010111010, 0b010111010, 0b010111010, }, // X
	{ 0b011110010, 0b010111001, 0b010011110, 0b100111010, }, // R
	{ 0b011010110, 0b100111001, 0b011010110, 0b100111001, }, // S
	{ 0b110010011, 0b001111100, 0b110010011, 0b001111100, }, // Z
	{ 0b100100111, 0b111100100, 0b111001001, 0b001001111, }, // V
	{ 0b110011010, 0b001111010, 0b010110011, 0b010111100, }, // 7
	{ 0b100110011, 0b011110100, 0b110011001, 0b001011110, }, // W
};

const int checker = (1 << 9) - 1;

{ 0b001111001, 0b111010010, 0b100111100, 0b010010111, }, // T
{ 0b010111010, 0b010111010, 0b010111010, 0b010111010, }, // X
{ 0b011110010, 0b010111001, 0b010011110, 0b100111010, }, // R
{ 0b011010110, 0b100111001, 0b011010110, 0b100111001, }, // S
{ 0b110010011, 0b001111100, 0b110010011, 0b001111100, }, // Z
{ 0b100100111, 0b111100100, 0b111001001, 0b001001111, }, // V
{ 0b110011010, 0b001111010, 0b010110011, 0b010111100, }, // 7
{ 0b100110011, 0b011110100, 0b110011001, 0b001011110, }, // W
